resources.string:
BlabberTabber allows you to record how much time each speaker has spoken in a meeting.
 
To pause, press "PAUSE", to resume, press "RECORD", and to reset the tally, press "RESET".
 
When the meeting is over, press finish to see the final tally. You will have the option to email or SMS the results.
 
BlabberTabber is wrong 40% of the time. If you use the BlabberTabber supercomputers, you can reduce the error rate to 20%.
